hotel_info.name: Hyatt House Charlotte Airport
hotel_info.description: All-suite hotel near Charlotte Airport featuring full kitchens, complimentary breakfast, free shuttle service, and modern amenities

rooms.description: Contemporary room featuring one clean and fresh Hilton Serenity queen bed with premium linens
Contemporary room featuring one clean and fresh Hilton Serenity queen bed with premium linens
Spacious room with two queen beds, ideal for families or small groups traveling together
Spacious room with two queen beds, ideal for families or small groups traveling together
Comfortable king room with modern amenities and dedicated workspace for business travelers
Comfortable king room with modern amenities and dedicated workspace for business travelers
Premium room with king bed, separate seating area, and executive-level amenities
Premium room with king bed, separate seating area, and executive-level amenities
Spacious suite with separate bedroom, living area, wet bar, and enhanced amenities perfect for extended stays
ADA-compliant room with mobility and hearing accessible features and one queen bed

policies.check_in: Check-in time is 3:00 PM. Hilton Honors members may request early check-in based on availability.
policies.check_out: Check-out time is 12:00 PM (noon). Late checkout available for Hilton Honors members subject to availability.
policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before arrival (6:00 PM local hotel time). Cancellations within 48 hours will incur a one-night room charge.
policies.pets: Pet-friendly hotel welcomes dogs and cats up to 75 lbs (2 pets per room). $75 non-refundable pet fee per stay.
policies.smoking: 100% non-smoking hotel. Designated smoking areas available outside the main entrance.
policies.payment: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover). Hilton Honors points can be used for stays. Valid photo ID and credit card required at check-in.
policies.parking: Complimentary self-parking for all guests. Oversized vehicle parking available. Electric vehicle charging stations on-site.
policies.airport_shuttle: Complimentary 24-hour airport shuttle service to/from Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT). Shuttle runs every 20 minutes.

amenities.fitness_center: 24-hour fitness center featuring state-of-the-art Precor cardio equipment, free weights, and strength training machines.
amenities.pool: Indoor heated pool and whirlpool open daily 6:00 AM - 11:00 PM. Towels provided poolside.
amenities.parking: Complimentary self-parking with covered and uncovered options. EV charging stations available.
amenities.wifi: Complimentary high-speed WiFi throughout the hotel. Hilton Honors members receive premium WiFi.
amenities.breakfast: Garden Grille restaurant serves hot breakfast buffet daily 6:00 AM - 10:00 AM (weekdays) and 7:00 AM - 11:00 AM (weekends).
amenities.restaurant: Garden Grille & Bar serves American cuisine for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Room service available.
amenities.business_center: 24-hour business center with computers, printers, copiers, and complimentary printing services.
amenities.airport_shuttle: Complimentary 24-hour airport shuttle to Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT). Shuttles every 20 minutes.
amenities.meeting_rooms: Over 10,000 sq ft of flexible meeting and event space with AV equipment and catering services.
amenities.laundry: Guest laundry facilities and same-day dry cleaning service available.
amenities.atm: ATM located in main lobby for guest convenience.

faqs.question: What time is check-in and check-out?
faqs.answer: Check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 12:00 PM (noon). Early check-in and late checkout may be available for Hilton Honors members based on availability.

faqs.question: Do you offer airport shuttle service?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to and from Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT). Shuttles run every 20 minutes.

faqs.question: Is parking free?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary self-parking for all guests, including covered parking and electric vehicle charging stations.

faqs.question: Is breakfast included?
faqs.answer: Breakfast is available at our Garden Grille restaurant from 6:00-10:00 AM weekdays and 7:00-11:00 AM weekends. Check your reservation for details on breakfast inclusion.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed?
faqs.answer: Yes, we're pet-friendly! We welcome dogs and cats up to 75 lbs (maximum 2 pets per room) with a $75 non-refundable pet fee per stay.

faqs.question: Do you have a pool and fitness center?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have an indoor heated pool with whirlpool (6 AM-11 PM) and a 24-hour fitness center with Precor equipment.

faqs.question: Is WiFi available?
faqs.answer: Yes, complimentary high-speed WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hilton Honors members receive premium WiFi access.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: You can cancel free of charge up to 48 hours before arrival (6:00 PM local time). Cancellations within 48 hours will incur a one-night room charge.

faqs.question: Can I earn Hilton Honors points?
faqs.answer: Yes! All stays are eligible for Hilton Honors points. Members also enjoy exclusive benefits like free WiFi, digital check-in, and room selection.

faqs.question: How far is the hotel from the airport?
faqs.answer: We're located just 1.5 miles from Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT), approximately 5 minutes by our complimentary shuttle.
